title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a 200 OK HTTP status code with no content, instead of the expected 404 error.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a 200 OK HTTP status code with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it should return a 404 error.
SR:
1. Download and unzip http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps.
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat server.
4. Observe that the response is a 200 OK HTTP status code with no content instead of a 404 error.
